semantics.label: translate:: Video sources
semantics.description: translate:: To ensure that the video works in all browsers you should add both WebM and MP4 formatted sources.

fields.label: translate:: Fit video player to use all available space
fields.description: translate:: If not set the video player will have the same aspect ratio as the video.

fields.label: translate:: Show video player controls
fields.description: translate:: Add controls to the video player. This allows users to play, pause, etc.

fields.label: translate:: Auto-play video
fields.description: translate:: Start playing the video automatically. May not work on mobile devices.

fields.label: translate:: Loop video
fields.description: translate:: Automatically start the video over again when it ends.

fields.label: translate:: Name
fields.description: translate:: Helps identify content of this type.

fields.label: translate:: No players found
fields.default: translate:: Found no video players that supports the given video format.

fields.label: translate:: Aborted
fields.default: translate:: Media playback has been aborted.

fields.label: translate:: Unknown YouTube ID
fields.default: translate:: Unable to find video with the given YouTube ID.

fields.label: translate:: Restricted YouTube video
fields.default: translate:: The owner of this video does not allow it to be embedded.

fields.label: translate:: Type kind, refer to HTML living standard
translate:: Source language, must be defined for subtitles
fields.description: translate:: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If the kind attribute is set to subtitles, then srclang must be defined.
